venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
Join us for great company, delicious drinks, addicting atmosphere, and free appetizers on Thursday, October 8th at the Tavern On The Square in Central Square. We've recently added over 300 new members to our ThingsToDoBoston group within the past month and we want you to meet them. We'll start the mixer at 7pm and close down our private room at 10pm, but that doesn't mean you have to stop there. You can stay with our group or make it your pregame destination and then make your way around the rest of Central.

Suggested Attire: Dress to impress.

Directions:
Google Maps: http://maps.google.co...

Public Transportation Subway: Take the Red Line to the Central Square stop. We are located about a block south on your left.

Public Transportation Bus: The #1 MassAve/Dudley Station bus will take right through Central Square.

Driving from the west:
• Take Mass Pike (I-90) East to Exit 18 for Allston & Cambridge.
• Follow signs for Cambridge and Central Square (2/3 mile from the toll booth, you will run into Mass Ave (You will see Starbucks on the corner).
• Cross Mass Ave and take first left onto Bishop Allen Drive.
• Go two blocks to end and take a left onto Inman Street (it's not marked, however there is no other way to go).
item.name: Mixer
